commit message:
Changed handling of (sftp-)server start when no key is present. Now the
Gen-Key-Dialog is opened and server start delayed (or canceled). See
issues/18.

updated positioning of re-gen-key icon to be closer to table-heading,
see issues/18

now setting a largeIcon for notification, too. IMHO it makes not much
sense but is required by a cyanogen theme, see issues/18

added more logging and added handling of special case when client wants
to change working dir but gave a path which is doubled current working
dir (may happen due to home-dir/default-dir)
set version to 3.1.1 and code to 12
